Package it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategy

Class CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategyC2

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.GameModel.Board.CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategy.CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategyC2
All Implemented Interfaces:
CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategy
public class CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategyC2 extends Object implements CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategy
Modified CheckAndMoveProfessor strategy set up by Character 2. This strategy is different from the standard one in that it stores a preferred Player, who wins the professor in case of draw.

  • Method Details

    • getActivatingPlayer

      public String getActivatingPlayer()

    • checkAndMoveProfessor

      public void checkAndMoveProfessor(Professor prof, PlayerList playerList, Color color)
      Given a color in the professor set, this strategy gives the professor to the player that has the most students of that color in their dining room. In the case of a draw, if one of the drawing player is the activator of the character, they win the professor, otherwise, the last player who held such professor will keep it.
      Specified by:
      checkAndMoveProfessor in interface CheckAndMoveProfessorStrategy
